title: Official Trailer for Mystery Thriller 'Death 4 Dinner' with Michael Pare
description: "Great – now we're all stuck here with a murderer!" Gravitas has debuted the trailer for an indie mystery thriller titled Death 4 Dinner, which will be out on VOD in March. The latest film produced & directed by Lana Read, even though you've never heard of any of her previously films. "The devil is in the details." A savvy Detective and his partner attempt to unravel the mysterious sudden death of a prominent Senator, while simultaneously navigating his insanely quirky family & their fierce appetites for the now dead father's money. The film's cast includes Michael Paré, Wendell Kinney, John Savage, Cyril O'Reilly, Jessica Dawn Willis, Erik Fellows, Carly Wheeler, and Lenny Robinson. This sounds and looks like such a derivative film with an extra generic whodunit plot about greed & murder and all the usual shenanigans that come with these things. Despite its funny title, I don't think there's much of anything worthwhile about this. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Lana Read's thriller Death 4 Dinner, direct from YouTube: Savvy Detective Noah Rafferty (Michael Pare) and his partner (Wendell Kinney) attempt to unravel the mysterious sudden death of a prominent Ohio Senator (Cyril O'Reilly) while simultaneously […]
author: Alex Billington

text: TRAILERS by February 16, 2025Source: YouTube "Great – now we're all stuck here with a murderer!" Gravitas has debuted the trailer for an indie mystery thriller titled Death 4 Dinner, which will be out on VOD in March. The latest film produced & directed by Lana Read, even though you've never heard of any of her previously films. "The devil is in the details." A savvy Detective and his partner attempt to unravel the mysterious sudden death of a prominent Senator, while simultaneously navigating his insanely quirky family & their fierce appetites for the now dead father's money. The film's cast includes Michael Paré, Wendell Kinney, John Savage, Cyril O'Reilly, Jessica Dawn Willis, Erik Fellows, Carly Wheeler, and Lenny Robinson. This sounds and looks like such a derivative film with an extra generic whodunit plot about greed & murder and all the usual shenanigans that come with these things. Despite its funny title, I don't think there's much of anything worthwhile about this. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Lana Read's thriller Death 4 Dinner, direct from YouTube: Savvy Detective Noah Rafferty (Michael Pare) and his partner (Wendell Kinney) attempt to unravel the mysterious sudden death of a prominent Ohio Senator (Cyril O'Reilly) while simultaneously navigating his insanely quirky siblings & their fierce appetites for their recently deceased father's (John Savage) millions. Death 4 Dinner is directed by indie actress / writer / filmmaker Lana Read, director of films Christmas Collision, Forbearance, A Reluctant Heart, Heartland Harmony, and Wine Thief previously, plus many other shorts. The screenplay is co-written by Brian Dobbins, Lana Read and Philip Adrian Booth. It's also produced by Lana Read. This hasn't premiered at any festivals or elsewhere, as far as we know. Gravitas will release Read's Death 4 Dinner direct-to-VOD starting March 7th, 2025 coming soon. Anyone interested? Find more posts in: To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
February 16, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Great – now we're all stuck here with a murderer!" Gravitas has debuted the trailer for an indie mystery thriller titled Death 4 Dinner, which will be out on VOD in March. The latest film produced & directed by Lana Read, even though you've never heard of any of her previously films. "The devil is in the details." A savvy Detective and his partner attempt to unravel the mysterious sudden death of a prominent Senator, while simultaneously navigating his insanely quirky family & their fierce appetites for the now dead father's money. The film's cast includes Michael Paré, Wendell Kinney, John Savage, Cyril O'Reilly, Jessica Dawn Willis, Erik Fellows, Carly Wheeler, and Lenny Robinson. This sounds and looks like such a derivative film with an extra generic whodunit plot about greed & murder and all the usual shenanigans that come with these things. Despite its funny title, I don't think there's much of anything worthwhile about this.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Lana Read's thriller Death 4 Dinner, direct from YouTube:

Savvy Detective Noah Rafferty (Michael Pare) and his partner (Wendell Kinney) attempt to unravel the mysterious sudden death of a prominent Ohio Senator (Cyril O'Reilly) while simultaneously navigating his insanely quirky siblings & their fierce appetites for their recently deceased father's (John Savage) millions. Death 4 Dinner is directed by indie actress / writer / filmmaker Lana Read, director of films Christmas Collision, Forbearance, A Reluctant Heart, Heartland Harmony, and Wine Thief previously, plus many other shorts. The screenplay is co-written by Brian Dobbins, Lana Read and Philip Adrian Booth. It's also produced by Lana Read. This hasn't premiered at any festivals or elsewhere, as far as we know. Gravitas will release Read's Death 4 Dinner direct-to-VOD starting March 7th, 2025 coming soon. Anyone interested?

Find more posts in: To Watch, Trailer
